name: Cube: Gardens of Zen
summary: Cube is a game set against a Japanese/Oriental backdrop and features the young hero Cub. One morning Cub wakes up and wonders about the meaning of his life. Why is he just a cube? Is there more to life than being a cube? He sets out to find Sensei and adventure enrolls… The goal of the game is to collect all Wisdom Scrolls on the sides of the cube shaped world
